entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 01:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: N 26 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 16. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
